title: cafter
author: cafter
created_time: October 13, 2023, 09:48:15 AMLast edit: October 13, 2023, 10:03:04 AM by cafter
content: Which is more entertaining? playing games listening to music or without music just sound of the games like roulette ball bouncing on the metal wheel or playing games in silence? While listening to music its hard to control our emotions while losing and we are not able to concentrate on game. it is highly likely that we blow our account by betting high.but it is more entertaining while listening music on low volume and playing games.

comments.author: btc_angela
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on October 13, 2023, 09:48:15 AMWhich is more entertaining? playing games listening to music or without music just sound of the games like roulette ball bouncing on the metal wheel or playing games in silence? While listening to music its hard to control our emotions while losing and we are not able to concentrate on game. it is highly likely that we blow our account by betting high.but it is more entertaining while listening music on low volume and playing games.I don't think there is comparison though as far as gambling and listening to music. I mean you can play without music and I will assume majority doesn't want distraction when they are playing, hence it's better for us without any music in the background.Of course that is the psychology of gaming, we want to hear those sounds of slot machines, or the roulette ball bouncing around that metal wheel and hopefully it will bounce to your number. In a traditional based casinos though, there are entertainment so there could be live band to hear and watch during your game time.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: What question should we be expecting here in gambling discussion about what we do when gambling? Should we expect questions like, have you ever gambled while taking your bath? Have you ever gambled while eating? Have you ever gambled while drinking wine? Have you ever gambles while…Most times we just need to rest if we don’t have anything substantial to make thread about. Threads like this and those I listed above are the reasons why gambling board is tagged as the den for spammer and yet whenever we come across such threads we still reply rather than ignore until something more useful comes into play.

comments.author: Hatchy
comments.body: Op, don't take this the wrong way, but I don't think such topics are really necessary to be discussed here on the gambling board.it should be in the off topic section.Nevertheless, we all enjoy listening to music while doing different things, be it reading, resting, playing games as you stated. What ever you choose to use it for it's usually fits in place. Music is a work of art that can express ones feelings it state at that particular time. When playing games, I prefer listening to the sounds of the games and not music as it make me feel the game more.

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on October 13, 2023, 09:48:15 AMWhich is more entertaining? playing games listening to music or without music just sound of the games like roulette ball bouncing on the metal wheel or playing games in silence? This is an individual preference we can each decide on what we want, some can easily get distracted by just making noise in an environment and they can't cope to listening to music while gambling because it's a serious distraction on them, also we have some gamblers who are fond of playing music while gambling because in doing so, they have more pleasure in that and enjoy the fun than when everywhere is quiet.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on October 13, 2023, 09:48:15 AM[/b]While listening to music its hard to control our emotions while losing and we are not able to concentrate on game. it is highly likely that we blow our account by betting high.There are sometimes that you may want to enjoy yourself, the game will not be about winning and you are not going to use high amount of money. Using like $0.05 dollar for each game played, playing music and having some glass of bear with barbecue. Haven't you tried something like that before? And if you are with friends, you are going to like it.But if you are doing something like that and you want a bigger winning, the day may likely ended bad.

comments.author: Oilacris
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on October 13, 2023, 09:48:15 AMWhich is more entertaining? playing games listening to music or without music just sound of the games like roulette ball bouncing on the metal wheel or playing games in silence? While listening to music its hard to control our emotions while losing and we are not able to concentrate on game. it is highly likely that we blow our account by betting high.but it is more entertaining while listening music on low volume and playing games.We do speak about roulette game then i do listen up my own playlist when the ball is rollin rather than on hearing out those literal sounds.I dont mind much about concentration knowing thatroulette game is really that just heavily rely on luck and its some game that doesnt really need up for some analysis on which it is really that something that ends up on preference because there are ones who doesnt really like on getting those kind of distraction on the time that they are playing and this is why they would really be liking on having those normal sounds and doesnt really like on some mix up.Quote from: Hatchy on October 13, 2023, 09:53:20 AMOp, don't take this the wrong way, but I don't think such topics are really necessary to be discussed here on the gambling board.it should be in the off topic section.Nevertheless, we all enjoy listening to music while doing different things, be it reading, resting, playing games as you stated. What ever you choose to use it for it's usually fits in place. Music is a work of art that can express ones feelings it state at that particular time. When playing games, I prefer listening to the sounds of the games and not music as it make me feel the game more.Not totally that off topic since this one is really that considered to be valid topic since it do really connects out with gambling rather than ontalking again on how to avoid gambling addiction kind of topic once again.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on October 13, 2023, 09:48:15 AMWhich is more entertaining? playing games listening to music or without music just sound of the games like roulette ball bouncing on the metal wheel or playing games in silence? While listening to music its hard to control our emotions while losing and we are not able to concentrate on game. it is highly likely that we blow our account by betting high.but it is more entertaining while listening music on low volume and playing games.Well, I very much enjoy playing slot or casino games while listening to music, sometimes with volume very loud depending on the game I am playing, I can say for sure that this has never been a reason for me to lose a game and or gamble out of control.If one thing I have actually noticed, its the fact that I don't even like the sound of games while playing, they seem to be a distraction most of the time, this is why sometimes, if i am not listening to music while playing a game, i prefer to turn off the game sound completely and play in total silence, this also helps save my battery, whether it be on my mobile phone am playing or my laptop, playing without sound helps save my battery for longer play time.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on October 13, 2023, 09:48:15 AMWhich is more entertaining? playing games listening to music or without music just sound of the games like roulette ball bouncing on the metal wheel or playing games in silence? While listening to music its hard to control our emotions while losing and we are not able to concentrate on game. it is highly likely that we blow our account by betting high.but it is more entertaining while listening music on low volume and playing games.It's usually with music or with the natural bgm of the game (if it has one). I rarely do anything without music, even if what I was doing was just playing. If it had an in-game music that I don't mind then why not, but if it doesn't have one, I usually just start up my playlist. I call bs on "controlling emotions while listening to music" unless you have proof (other than yourself ofc). There's also the idea of "concentrating", jesus christ I don't think you need any concentration when clicking a button for a dice game. Maybe if it was poker/blackjack, but they're relatively simple games still. I must say I pity your concentration if you can't manage thinking while having bgm in simple instances like this.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Slot is a boring game.Usually we are playing slot with music, because is take a lot time for reaching the bonus with normal spin. I just listening/watching some anime while playing slot, IDK for other but a game who don't required a long result most the time we are not listening music.Slot is different game.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: Listening to music is like dun to me especially when I am listening to my favorite music. It all depends on the mood that I am into before I will love to listen to music. Since I gamble for fun most times, I prefer listening to music when i am gambling especially when it is my lucky moment.I switch off the music when I have lost straight three bets and I need to concentrate on my bets. If it is sportsbet, especially football, at all the time winning or losing I would prefer the music to be on so that I have have the dull vibe of the game, so that I don't get angry if one of the players that I bet his club to win is not playing well or is making mistakes. Like Last season when Maguire was messing the game up with own goals and a lot of mistake, I will only laugh and not getting angry. Music consoles me in sportsbets.

comments.author: MArsland
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on October 13, 2023, 09:48:15 AMWhich is more entertaining? playing games listening to music or without music just sound of the games like roulette ball bouncing on the metal wheel or playing games in silence? While listening to music its hard to control our emotions while losing and we are not able to concentrate on game. it is highly likely that we blow our account by betting high.but it is more entertaining while listening music on low volume and playing games.In fact, I often play using silent mode, especially when in public places. Meanwhile, if I'm in a closed room and alone, I definitely use music from the game. This is because gambling in my place is considered a bad activity so you have to be able to adapt and don't let other people or even your own family find out. So I prefer playing game music rather than turning on seasons outside of games because seasons from games feel the sensation while playing. Maybe that's the function of casinos in providing music from games because it can create a special desire for gamblers.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on October 13, 2023, 09:48:15 AMWhich is more entertaining? playing games listening to music or without music just sound of the games like roulette ball bouncing on the metal wheel or playing games in silence? While listening to music its hard to control our emotions while losing and we are not able to concentrate on game. it is highly likely that we blow our account by betting high.but it is more entertaining while listening music on low volume and playing games.I like to fully emerge while playing, so I prefer without music just the sound of the games I'm playing I can concentrate and enjoy more of the games if I am fully engaged in the game, that is why the casinos create their unique sounds for their games because they know that gamblers love to listen to the sound of the game they are playing I have a friend who play Dice on one casino and he do not want to play in any other casino because he loves the sounds of the dice while playing.It is part of the attraction of every casino to create unique sounds of their own on their games to attract more players and prefer their platform over the other, of course reputation still rank high when it comes to preferences.

comments.author: Blitzboy
comments.body: Getting into gambling noises and music, huh? gambling, gambling... The raw sound of a game, like the roulette ball clink-clink-clink on the metal wheel, is mesmerizing. It's authentic, real, and immersive. What if that clinking sound made you want a drink every time? Possible water sip?But music... might it be a double-edged sword? It motivates, stirs emotions, and occasionally makes you forget you're playing. This is tough, especially if your wallet is at stake. While playing low-volume sounds may be fun, try to stay calm and have fun.

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on October 13, 2023, 09:48:15 AMWhich is more entertaining? playing games listening to music or without music just sound of the games like roulette ball bouncing on the metal wheel or playing games in silence? While listening to music its hard to control our emotions while losing and we are not able to concentrate on game. it is highly likely that we blow our account by betting high.but it is more entertaining while listening music on low volume and playing games.        -  I think as long as the music is quiet and calm, it's acceptable to listen to while playing slot machines. However, it might not be a good idea to listen to music while playing other games, especially if you or I are playing poker.Of course, poker is a game that heavily relies on strategy and the thinking. Now when you're listening to music while doing it, it will provide us with a small diversion that will prevent us from thinking clearly and prevent us from being able to develop sound strategies. That may be the cause of our failure. That won't help us, to put it briefly.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on October 13, 2023, 09:48:15 AMWhich is more entertaining? playing games listening to music or without music just sound of the games like roulette ball bouncing on the metal wheel or playing games in silence? While listening to music its hard to control our emotions while losing and we are not able to concentrate on game. it is highly likely that we blow our account by betting high.but it is more entertaining while listening music on low volume and playing games.I tried one lately and muted the tab of the site of where I was playing Sweet Bonanza and put my favorite Youtube playlist on.I was not getting mad at all despite several loses in a row which if I played without music it is a sure thing that I would have raised the bet and say goodbye to my money.While playing with the same bet and not caring much what would happen,win or lose the game kept me in the same loop and I didn't lose nor I won but at least I increased the percentage to my next VIP level.

comments.author: Ziskinberg
comments.body: I take my gambling pretty seriously. When I'm in the zone, there's no room for music. It's like kryptonite for my focus, and it doesn't do my winning streak any favors. There's a time for tunes, and a time for gambling – trying to mix them just doesn't cut it for me.

comments.author: Razmirraz
comments.body: Seriously, that's the main key when someone plays games. Most game players who place slightly higher bets do not want their seriousness when playing to be ruined by sounds outside the game, including music. They are more comfortable hearing the sound of a slot machine, or the bouncing sound of a roulette ball than the sound of music which can disturb their concentration while playing.For some gamblers who want to have fun in the game, they will be more entertained by the sound of music. They don't really care about the results obtained, as long as the adrenaline produced can bring their mood to a level of pleasure, they will still feel satisfied even if they have to come out with a defeat.

comments.author: passwordnow
comments.body: It depends on my mood, sometimes as I play I have to play some music to make myself set my mood. But sometimes I'm not in my mood and I find playing music annoying. That really depends on how's my day, whether it's good or bad. If I have a tiring day and I want to gamble and that's making me think that I should listen to set the mood then I have to play it before playing. But during the time that I am gambling, I can stop that any moment when I find it annoying and not appealing to my ears. So, it's really random moments when I do it because I'm not sure whether I'd like it when things aren't perfect and had to deal with a lot of things during the day and sometimes the music from the games is more than enough already. And for those that like to listen, always listen to those relaxing ones. Maybe some likes to hear metal music while gambling to make their heartbeat faster.

comments.author: Peanutswar
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on October 13, 2023, 09:48:15 AMWhich is more entertaining? playing games listening to music or without music just sound of the games like roulette ball bouncing on the metal wheel or playing games in silence? While listening to music its hard to control our emotions while losing and we are not able to concentrate on game. it is highly likely that we blow our account by betting high.but it is more entertaining while listening music on low volume and playing games.We know how music can bring different vibes to the player or even emotions depending on this kind of music,  if you use hype music during playing or even the casual music that you know and have a ride on it you'll not get stressed too much for me this is quite effective because I know I can vibe with the song easily, but of course we cannot remove the regrets of being overwhelmed while playing, I remember before while im playing im shouting the song while seeing me getting a multiplier gives more boost while playing, in some point too I stop the music when the situation is not good like you need to take with a serious mode so the game gets more focus, too much sounds too can be distracting, I most likely do this while playing table top games.
